_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an7.61:13.1^where_here_and_before: The land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood near Kallavāḷamutta Village in the land of the Magadhans
an7.61^where: The land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood and near Kallavāḷamutta Village in the land of the Magadhans.
